room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We did Pirate Cove. The place was a bit confusing to find but it was great! Great theme, really well put together, Ivan was so nice and we really had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: I went to the pirate room on Thursday night with my boyfriend and some of our friends. Absolutely loved it! The theme was fantastic and well done. We love going to these rooms and this was my favorite theme by far. Great puzzles too! Really fun technology. It's a must go if you're ready to escape a (fictional) pirate gang who's going to murder you if you cannot escape their lair within the hour!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Supper fun game, highly recommended. Ppl working there are so cool and they are trying to make it even better

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Bay" by Maze Rooms in Los Angeles
review: We have done the FBI room and now the Pirate Bay, we escaped both with just minutes to spare. So much fun! We are already planning our next room! Keep the rooms coming guys!!!
